medical_history.chief_complaint: Pruritic skin plaques and papules on scalp, face, back, and back of hands.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms persisted for over a year, worsening with sunlight exposure and improving on cloudy and rainy days. Previous treatments provided only short-lived relief, leading to progressive aggravation of symptoms until diagnosed with chronic actinic dermatitis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had a history of being diagnosed with 'eczema' and treated with glucocorticoid ointment and oral antihistamines.
